entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • PublishAot failed with LNK1181 error #37297

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • `donet watch` fails on rebuilt with locked source generator dll (net8) #35607
  • Workload installation failed: microsoft.android.sdk.windows::34.0.64 is not found in NuGet feeds https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json" #37580
  • Replace DOS stub due to potential copyright issue #37550
  • [NETSDKE2E]Publishing blazorwasm project failed with AOT compilation = true with .net9 SDK #37524

PullRequests

Merged

  • wrap and handle cancellation exceptions in .NET Task #37055
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.2xx
  • Improve Container support for AOT publishing and targeting musl runtimes. #37054
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • don't use cookies to unblock CSRF workflows #37221
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Bump dockercredsprovider to pick up a bugfix #36707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add missing --archiveoutputpath option to .NET Framework container tool task #36652
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
